tool_description: Fancy Twitter provides an interface to Twitter that only includes tweets from the actual athletes and their team and league offices. You can also sort these tweets by AI/ML-generated Sentiment and Subjectivity scores.
name: Fancy Twitter
title: Fancy Twitter

api_list.name: organizations_all
api_list.description: Return information about all of the organizations/leagues that Fancy Twitter tracks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/db/organizations/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/db/organizations/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

twitterplayerlistnumber.description: Twitter list number for players in the league

twitterteamlistnumber.description: Twitter list number for teams in the league

twitteruserid.description: Twitter user id for the league office

twitterusername.description: Twitter user name for the league office

api_list.name: team_tweets_negative_sentiment_average
api_list.description: Returns a list of teams whose players' tweets express the least positive sentiments.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/db/tweets/negativesentiment/team/average"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/db/tweets/negativesentiment/team/average"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

averagesentiment.description: ML-generated estimate of the average sentiment of all tweets.  Ranges between -1.0 (negative) and 1.0 (positive)

averagesubjectivity.description: ML-generated estimate of the average subjectivity of all tweets.  Ranges between 0.0 (objective) and 1.0 (subjective)

api_list.name: team_tweets_sentiment_average

api_list.name: tweets_all
api_list.description: Returns individual tweets, associated statistics and ML-based sentiment analysis data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/db/tweets/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancy-twitter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: teams_all
